name: Brandy Alexander
description: It's sweet, but not too sweet. It's retro, but really timeless. Only the hardest cases could resist the charms of this creamy, frothy delight. That's a dare.
keywords: brandy, crème de cacao, heavy cream, winter

recipeInstructions.text: Shake brandy, crème de cacao and cream with ice.
Grate a little nutmeg on top.
